dialogue.line: I wanted a rap battle just to check if u r another dumb impostros like the others

idk girl you just came out from nowhere
How do I know youre not the impostor?
whatt :( whatttt no :(( I just said Im crewmate before 0.565475675676seconds ago cmonn :((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((
